io.dataplay.storm.workers.logging

Class LoggingBolt

  • java.lang.Object
    • backtype.storm.topology.base.BaseComponent
      • backtype.storm.topology.base.BaseRichBolt
        • io.dataplay.storm.workers.AbstractBolt
          • io.dataplay.storm.workers.logging.LoggingBolt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    backtype.storm.task.IBolt, backtype.storm.topology.IComponent, backtype.storm.topology.IRichBolt, IDataWorker, Serializable

    public final class LoggingBolt
extends AbstractBolt
    This simple logging bolt simple logs the contents of a tuple before sending it on its way. Useful for debugging.s
    Author:
    Michael Krotscheck
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
